name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones
description: Experience industry-leading noise cancellation with the Sony WH-1000XM5. Features 30 hours of battery life, premium sound quality, and comfortable design for all-day wear.

name: Fitbit Charge 5 Fitness Tracker
description: Track your health journey with the advanced Fitbit Charge 5. Monitors ECG, stress levels, heart rate, sleep quality, and activity with a vibrant color display.

name: Samsung 65" QLED 4K Smart TV
description: Transform your home entertainment with this Samsung QLED TV featuring Quantum HDR technology for stunning contrast and vibrant colors.

name: Canon EOS R6 Camera Kit
description: Capture professional-quality photos and 4K video with the Canon EOS R6. This full-frame mirrorless camera features in-body stabilization and advanced autofocus.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 14" M3 Pro
description: Experience extraordinary performance with the MacBook Pro featuring the M3 Pro chip. Includes a stunning Liquid Retina XDR display and up to 18 hours of battery life.

name: Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Speaker
description: Experience 360Â° sound with the portable Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II. Features 17 hours of battery life and water resistance for indoor and outdoor use.

name: Nintendo Switch OLED Model
description: Enjoy enhanced gaming with the Nintendo Switch OLED featuring a vibrant 7-inch screen, adjustable stand, enhanced audio, and 64GB of internal storage.

name: Dyson V15 Detect Cordless Vacuum
description: Experience next-level cleaning with the Dyson V15 Detect featuring laser dust detection, intelligent suction, and advanced filtration.

name: Herman Miller Aeron Ergonomic Chair
description: Invest in your comfort with the iconic Herman Miller Aeron chair, engineered for proper posture and all-day support.

name: Breville Barista Express Espresso Machine
description: Craft cafe-quality espresso at home with the Breville Barista Express. Features integrated conical burr grinder and precise extraction control.
